Mewdeko Docs
Edit this page

Class SuggestionsService

Manages suggestion operations within a Discord server, facilitating suggestion creation, tracking, and status updates.

Inheritance
object
SuggestionsService
Implements
INService
Inherited Members
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()
object.GetType()

object.ToString()
Namespace: Mewdeko.Modules.Suggestions.Services
Assembly: Mewdeko.dll
Syntax
public class SuggestionsService : INService

Constructors

| Edit this page View Source

SuggestionsService(DbService, DiscordSocketClient, AdministrationService, PermissionService, GuildSettingsService, EventHandler)

Initializes a new instance of the SuggestionsService class.

Declaration
public SuggestionsService(DbService db, DiscordSocketClient client, AdministrationService aserv, PermissionService permserv, GuildSettingsService guildSettings, EventHandler eventHandler)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DbService db

Database service for data persistence.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client instance.
AdministrationService aserv

Service for administration tasks.
PermissionService permserv

Service for managing permissions.
GuildSettingsService guildSettings

Service for guild-specific settings.
EventHandler eventHandler

Event handler for Discord client events.

AddThreadChannel(ulong, ulong)

Adds a new thread channel association with a suggestion message. This is used to track thread channels that are created for discussing specific suggestions.

Declaration
public Task AddThreadChannel(ulong messageId, ulong threadChannelId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong messageId

The message ID of the suggestion.
ulong threadChannelId

The thread channel ID created for the suggestion's discussion.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation of adding the thread channel association.

Returns

SendAcceptEmbed(IGuild, DiscordSocketClient, IUser, ulong, ITextChannel, string?, IDiscordInteraction?)

Sends an acceptance embed for a suggestion in a guild. It manages sending a custom embed for suggestions marked as accepted, archiving the thread if set, and notifying the suggestion's author.

Declaration
public Task SendAcceptEmbed(IGuild guild, DiscordSocketClient client, IUser user, ulong suggestion, ITextChannel channel, string? reason = null, IDiscordInteraction? interaction = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild where the suggestion is made.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client.
IUser user

The user who accepted the suggestion.
ulong suggestion

The ID of the suggestion being accepted.
ITextChannel channel

The channel where the acceptance message will be sent.
string reason

The reason for acceptance. Optional.
IDiscordInteraction interaction

The interaction context, if available. Optional.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation.
| Edit this page View Source

SendConsiderEmbed(IGuild, DiscordSocketClient, IUser, ulong, ITextChannel, string?, IDiscordInteraction?)

Sends a consideration embed for a suggestion in a guild. Similar to denial, it sends an embed indicating the suggestion is under consideration, with customized messages if set, and handles archiving.

Declaration
public Task SendConsiderEmbed(IGuild guild, DiscordSocketClient client, IUser user, ulong suggestion, ITextChannel channel, string? reason = null, IDiscordInteraction? interaction = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild where the suggestion is made.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client.
IUser user

The user considering the suggestion.
ulong suggestion

The ID of the suggestion being considered.
ITextChannel channel

The channel where the consideration message will be sent.
string reason

The reason for consideration. Optional.
IDiscordInteraction interaction

The interaction context, if available. Optional.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation.
| Edit this page View Source

SendDenyEmbed(IGuild, DiscordSocketClient, IUser, ulong, ITextChannel, string?, IDiscordInteraction?)

Sends a denial embed for a suggestion in a guild. This method handles fetching the suggestion, checking if it exists, and then sending a customized embed based on whether a custom deny message is set. It also handles archiving the suggestion thread if necessary.

Declaration
public Task SendDenyEmbed(IGuild guild, DiscordSocketClient client, IUser user, ulong suggestion, ITextChannel channel, string? reason = null, IDiscordInteraction? interaction = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild where the suggestion is made.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client.
IUser user

The user who denied the suggestion.
ulong suggestion

The ID of the suggestion being denied.
ITextChannel channel

The text channel where the denial message will be sent.
string reason

The reason for denial. Optional.
IDiscordInteraction interaction

The interaction context, if available. Optional.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation.
| Edit this page View Source

SendImplementEmbed(IGuild, DiscordSocketClient, IUser, ulong, ITextChannel, string?, IDiscordInteraction?)

Sends an implementation embed for a suggestion in a guild. This method handles the entire process of marking a suggestion as implemented, including sending a customized embed message, and managing the suggestion's thread.

Declaration
public Task SendImplementEmbed(IGuild guild, DiscordSocketClient client, IUser user, ulong suggestion, ITextChannel channel, string? reason = null, IDiscordInteraction? interaction = null)

SendSuggestion(IGuild, IGuildUser, DiscordSocketClient, string, ITextChannel, IDiscordInteraction?)

Submits a suggestion in a guild, handling the creation of suggestion messages with reactions or buttons based on configuration, and potentially starting a thread for discussion.

Declaration
public Task SendSuggestion(IGuild guild, IGuildUser user, DiscordSocketClient client, string suggestion, ITextChannel channel, IDiscordInteraction? interaction = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild where the suggestion is submitted.
IGuildUser user

The user submitting the suggestion.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client.
string suggestion

The text of the suggestion being submitted.
ITextChannel channel

The channel where the suggestion submission confirmation will be sent.
IDiscordInteraction interaction

The interaction context, if available. Optional.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation.

Suggest(IGuild, ulong, ulong, ulong, string)

Records a new suggestion in the database.

Declaration
public Task Suggest(IGuild guild, ulong suggestId, ulong messageId, ulong userId, string suggestion)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild where the suggestion is made.
ulong suggestId

The suggestion number within the guild.
ulong messageId

The ID of the message containing the suggestion.
ulong userId

The ID of the user who made the suggestion.
string suggestion

The content of the suggestion.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation to save the suggestion.

UpdatePickedEmote(ulong, ulong, int)

Updates the emote picked by a user for a specific suggestion message. If the user has not previously picked an emote for this message, a new vote record is created. Otherwise, the existing vote is updated.

Declaration
public Task UpdatePickedEmote(ulong messageId, ulong userId, int emotePicked)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong messageId

The ID of the message the vote is associated with.
ulong userId

The ID of the user casting or changing their vote.
int emotePicked

The ID of the emote picked by the user.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A Task representing the asynchronous operation of updating or adding the vote.

UpdateSuggestionButtonMessage(IGuild, string?, bool)

Updates the message content or embed of the suggestion button in a guild. It allows bypassing the channel check and directly updating or creating a new message if the original message is not found.

Declaration
public Task UpdateSuggestionButtonMessage(IGuild guild, string? code, bool bypasschannelcheck = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IGuild guild

The guild to update the suggestion button message in.
string code

The new content or embed code for the suggestion button message.
bool bypasschannelcheck

Determines whether to bypass the check for the suggestion button channel setting.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

INService
